title: University Exam Scheduler
description: Software in development with the purpose to schedule university exams for 200 multidisciplinary courses within the span of 5 days for more than 1500 students of IIT Bhilai .GUI to be used - PyQt6

title: Restaurant Menu Web App
description: A Django web app to let customers see a restaurant menu and meal availability.

description: A PHP website made for a Catering Service provider (Course Project)

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app and desktop app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: Canteen Software
description: Inspired by the software used in IIT Bhilai Mess , the aim of this software is to manage the daily transactions of institute canteens. GUI used - PySimpleGUI

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.

description: A chatbot built that can discuss anything with a human and is built using the ChatGPT API.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
